Question
========

When is Fisher's exact-key used? 
Answerlist
----------
* When testing the difference in proportions in small samples.
* When testing the difference in means in small samples.
* When testing the difference in proportions between dependent samples.
* When testing the difference in averages between dependent samples.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
